titleStmt.title: Analepsis, or, Saint Peters bonds abide for rhetorick worketh no release, is evidenced in a serious and sober consideration of Dr. John Gauden's sense and solution of the Solemn League and Covenant : so far as it relates to the government of the church by episcopacy / by Zech. Crofton.
titleStmt.author: Crofton, Zachary, 1625 or 6-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
